conbody.p: Use the basic or the alternate of the clause at 252.223-7006, Prohibition on Storage, Treatment, and Disposal of Toxic or Hazardous Materials, in all solicitations and contracts which require, may require, or permit contractor access to a DoD installation.
(a) Use the basic clause, unless a determination is made under 223.7104 (a)(10).
(b) Use the alternate I clause when the Secretary of the military department issues a determination under the exception at 223.7104 (a)(10).
